title: PRIVACY_ACT_SPECIAL_STUDIES
all_text:
Special StudiesSpecial studiesThe Privacy Commissioner shall carry out or 60 (1) cause to be carried out such studies as may be referred tothe Commissioner by the Minister of Justice (a) relating to the privacy of individuals, concerning the extension of the rights to which in- (b) dividuals are entitled under this Act in respect of personal information about themselves, andrelating to the collection, retention, disposal, use (c) or disclosure of personal information by persons orbodies, other than government institutions, that comewithin the legislative authority of Parliament, and the Privacy Commissioner shall report thereon to theMinister of Justice from time to time. Current to December 10, 2025 39 Last amended on June 2, 2025

PrivacyOffice of the Privacy CommissionerSpecial StudiesSections 60-64 Reports to be tabledThe Minister of Justice shall cause each report by the (2) Privacy Commissioner under subsection (1) to be laid before Parliament on any of the first fifteen days after receipt thereof that either House of Parliament is sitting. 1980-81-82-83, c. 111, Sch. II “60”.
